::Hevn::

     He sighs.  "Blackstorm, I really have no way of knowing.  I can only guess that you were a target of oportunity.  He needed a hostage to escape.  The fact that the hostage was you was just a bonus, or so I would guess."  He shrugs.  "I'm sorry I don't know more.  But I really wasn't kept very informed of the happenings at the Maximal base."
